mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, user_name, user_password, name, sex, phone, email, id_card, role, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, #{role}, #{isDeleted}, #{gmtCreate}, #{createBy}, #{gmtModified}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{version})
mapper.select: select user_id userId, user_name userName, user_password userPassword, name, sex, phone, email, id_card idCard, role from t_user where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update t_user set user_name = #{userName}, user_password = #{userPassword}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, id_card = #{idCard}, role = #{role} where user_id=#{userId}

#{userCode}
mapper.select: select count(user_password) from t_sys_user where is_deleted = 0 and user_acct = #{userAcct}

select a.user_code userCode, a.user_name userName, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_pwd userPwd, a.id_card idCard, a.sex sex, a.phone, a.email, a.remark, a.is_deleted, a.sort_no, a.gmt_create, a.create_by, a.gmt_modified, a.last_modified_by, a.version from t_user a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by gmt_create desc
